      • saveBitmap

        public static void saveBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                              boolean hasLandmarks)
        Saves a Bitmap object to disk for analysis.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The bitmap to save.

      • convertYUV420SPToARGB8888

        public static void convertYUV420SPToARGB8888(byte[] input,
                                             int[] output,
                                             int width,
                                             int height,
                                             boolean halfSize)
        Converts YUV420 semi-planar data to ARGB 8888 data using the supplied width and height. The input and output must already be allocated and non-null. For efficiency, no error checking is performed.
        Parameters:
        input - The array of YUV 4:2:0 input data.
        output - A pre-allocated array for the ARGB 8:8:8:8 output data.
        width - The width of the input image.
        height - The height of the input image.
        halfSize - If true, downsample to 50% in each dimension, otherwise not.

      • convertYUV420ToARGB8888

        public static void convertYUV420ToARGB8888(byte[] y,
                                           byte[] u,
                                           byte[] v,
                                           int[] output,
                                           int width,
                                           int height,
                                           int yRowStride,
                                           int uvRowStride,
                                           int uvPixelStride,
                                           boolean halfSize)
        Converts YUV420 semi-planar data to ARGB 8888 data using the supplied width and height. The input and output must already be allocated and non-null. For efficiency, no error checking is performed.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the input image.
        height - The height of the input image.
        halfSize - If true, downsample to 50% in each dimension, otherwise not.
        output - A pre-allocated array for the ARGB 8:8:8:8 output data.

      • convertYUV420SPToRGB565

        public static void convertYUV420SPToRGB565(byte[] input,
                                           byte[] output,
                                           int width,
                                           int height)
        Converts YUV420 semi-planar data to RGB 565 data using the supplied width and height. The input and output must already be allocated and non-null. For efficiency, no error checking is performed.
        Parameters:
        input - The array of YUV 4:2:0 input data.
        output - A pre-allocated array for the RGB 5:6:5 output data.
        width - The width of the input image.
        height - The height of the input image.

      • convertARGB8888ToYUV420SP

        public static void convertARGB8888ToYUV420SP(int[] input,
                                             byte[] output,
                                             int width,
                                             int height)
        Converts 32-bit ARGB8888 image data to YUV420SP data. This is useful, for instance, in creating data to feed the classes that rely on raw camera preview frames.
        Parameters:
        input - An array of input pixels in ARGB8888 format.
        output - A pre-allocated array for the YUV420SP output data.
        width - The width of the input image.
        height - The height of the input image.

      • convertRGB565ToYUV420SP

        public static void convertRGB565ToYUV420SP(byte[] input,
                                           byte[] output,
                                           int width,
                                           int height)
        Converts 16-bit RGB565 image data to YUV420SP data. This is useful, for instance, in creating data to feed the classes that rely on raw camera preview frames.
        Parameters:
        input - An array of input pixels in RGB565 format.
        output - A pre-allocated array for the YUV420SP output data.
        width - The width of the input image.
        height - The height of the input image.
